DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study directly compare body composition , body fat distribution , morphological functional feature adipose tissue skeletal muscle South Asians European Caucasians .
DOC.brief_title: ( Mol-SHARE ) Molecular Study Health Assessment Risk Ethnic Groups
DOC.detailed_description: Excess body fat , hallmark obesity major risk factor development insulin resistance ( decreased insulin sensitivity ) , type 2 diabetes , cardiovascular disease . Previous study show South Asians ( people originate Indian subcontinent ) appear particularly prone develop diabetes heart disease compare white Caucasians European origin . In Canada , Study Health Assessment Risk Ethnic group ( SHARE ) , observed random selection South Asian European individual , South Asians twice much type 2 diabetes cardiovascular disease significantly insulin resistant Europeans despite similar body mass index ( BMI ) waist circumference . It possible increased propensity South Asians develop insulin resistance , type 2 diabetes , cardiovascular disease relate great total body fat and/or increase visceral fat addition possible biological difference adipose tissue skeletal muscle tissue . The primary objective study therefore determine difference among age , sex , BMI-matched people South Asian European Caucasian descent body composition ( specifically total body fat , lean body mass ) fat distribution ( fat store body ) . This study therefore test hypothesis similar BMI , South Asians total body fat less lean body mass age sex-matched European Caucasians . The secondary objective study look difference two ethnic group biological level , include : difference visceral fat , adipose tissue morphology , imflammation adipokine production , skeletal muscle fat content , fatty acid oxidation mitochondrial activity .
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Between 1850 year age Fits one follow BMIStrata : Stratum 1 : BMI 18.5 – 25 kg/m2 Stratum 2 : BMI 25.1 –29.9 kg/m2 Stratum 3 : BMI 30 45 kg/m2 Ability willingness complete dietary activity diary questionnaires Concurrent antidiabetic , antithypertensive , antiobesity lipidlowering medication Use systemic glucocorticosteroids ( topical inhale corticosteroid acceptable ) If participant one follow medical disorder : Known Diabetes Known renal impairment Known uncontrolled endocrine disorder ( e.g . hyperthyroidism , Cushing ’ syndrome , acromegaly , etc . ) Recent ( less three month ) major surgery hopitalization severe illness History active malignancy , chronic inflammatory disorder , chronic infection would interfere protocol completion Any medical , social geographic condition , opinion investigator would allow safe reliable completion protocol Anticoagulant therapy ( e.g . Coumadin ) Orthopaedic contraindication exercise test Significant fluctuation weight past 3 month ( e.g . > 10 % ) Extreme weight loss diet ( e.g . Atkins , Bernstein ) History drug alcohol dependency within six month prior sign inform consent form If participant contraindication MRI : If participant clautrophobic suffers fear closed space If participant significant contact metal ( e.g . welding ) If participant foreign body eye confirm Xray orbit Body Mass Index > 45 kg/m2 Participant hip joint replacement surgery 68 week prior start study If participant : Cardiac pacemaker Artificial cardiac valve Aneurysm clip Neurostimulator Other implant device metal object body
